Cheater fest, there is no point playing this game unless you use cheats or play like a bot.
Another thing is that don't buy prime or any operation only play Free to Play game there are less cheaters and you have more fun.
I bought prime and operation riptide and every game even casual i am getting try hards, sweats or cheaters but in Free To Play there were very few of them.
So dont buy anything in this game it will only get worse.
This videogame sucked out all of mine soul . I recommend :
